summary: Hyperscalers (Microsoft, Google, Meta) have announced aggressive increases in AI-focused Capex for 2024/2025, driving strong demand for GPU compute. Current H100/A100 rental prices remain high ($3.21/hr), indicating sustained demand. The upcoming release of next-gen models (Gemini 2 confirmed for 2024, GPT-5 rumored) further fuels market optimism.
